    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108811</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108811</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205445</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Performance Ideas: Matt Davignon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leistung Ideen: Mattes Davignon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Idées d'Exécution : Davignon Mat</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Idéias Do Desempenho: Davignon Matt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Idee Di Prestazioni: Davignon Opaco</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιδέες απόδοσης: Ματ Davignon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ideas Del Funcionamiento: Davignon Mate</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">SPARK explores experimental music with Matt Davignon as he curates "Live Play" at Artist's Television Access, the first event in San Francisco's Soundwave Series. This Educator Guide is about the history of experimental music and sound art.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">FUNKEN erforscht experimentelle Musik mit mattem 
Davignon wie er Kuraten "Phasenspiel" am Fernsehen-Zugriff des 
Künstlers, der erste Fall in der Serie Soundwave San Franciscos. 
Diese Erzieher-Anleitung ist über die Geschichte der 
experimentellen Musik- und Tonkunst.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'ÉTINCELLE explore la musique expérimentale 
avec Davignon mat comme il des curés "jeu de phase" à l'accès de la
télévision de l'artiste, le premier événement de la série de 
Soundwave de San Francisco. Ce guide d'éducateur est au sujet 
de l'histoire de l'art expérimental de musique et de bruit.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A FAÍSCA explora a música experimental com 
Davignon matt como ele curates "jogo vivo" no acesso da televisão do 
artista, o primeiro evento na série de Soundwave do San Francisco. 
Esta guia do educador é sobre o history da arte experimental da
música e do som.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La SCINTILLA esplora la musica sperimentale con 
Davignon opaco come lui curates "gioco in tensione" ad accesso della 
televisione dell'artista, il primo evento in serie di Soundwave de San
Francisco. Questa guida dell'educatore è circa la storia 
dell'arte sperimentale del suono e di musica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο ΣΠΙΝΘΗΡΑΣ ερευνά την πειραματική μουσική με ματ 
Davignon όπως υπεφημέριοι "ζει παιχνίδι" στην τηλεοπτική 
πρόσβαση του καλλιτέχνη, το πρώτο γεγονός στη σειρά Soundwave 
του Σαν Φρανσίσκο. Αυτός ο οδηγός εκπαιδευτικών είναι για 
την ιστορία της πειραματικής μουσικής και της υγιούς τέχνης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La CHISPA explora música experimental con 
Davignon mate como él los curates "juego vivo" en el acceso de la 
televisión del artista, el primer acontecimiento en la serie de 
Soundwave de San Francisco. Esta guía del educador está sobre 
la historia del arte experimental de la música y del sonido.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205445</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>

VERSION:3.0

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
